title: Cinematic Sounds - Audio Pack
description: 100+ High quality audio for your cinematic!
longDescription:
Hi There!


In this pack you'1l find sounds for your cinematics/trailer. Impacts, stinger, risers, faders, you'll probably need this type of sound for a scene or a trailer of your game, and i hope it helps!


Here's the list:


  1. Big Impact v1
  2. Big Impact v2
  3. Big Impact v3
  4. Big Impact v4
  5. Big Impact v5
  6. Big Impact v6
  7. Big Impact v7
  8. Big Whoosh v1
  9. Big Whoosh v2
  10. Fade v1
  11. Fade v2
  12. Ambience v1
  13. Ambience v1
  14. High_Impact v1
  15. High_Impact v2
  16. High_Impact v3
  17. Horns v1
  18. Horror Impact v1
  19. Horror Impact v2
  20. Horror Impact v3
  21. Horror Impact v4
  22. Impact v1
  23. Impact v2
  24. Low Impact v1
  25. Low Impact v2
  26. Low Impact v3
  27. Rise v1
  28. Rise v2
  29. Rise v3
  30. Rise v4
  31. Ambience v1
  32. Stinger v1
  33. Stinger v2
  34. WindChimes v1


Check The preview

Check the documentation


All the folder contains a variation of the main audio file, that you're not paying for :) The price is for the main list above only

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim as your own work.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 102

Number of Audio Cues: 102

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The font used is BlackChancery Thin free distributed by 1001 fonts and the image is also free distributed for commercial use by unsplash
